verses.text: \w Arise|strong="H6965"\w*, \w shine|strong="H0215"\w*; for thy \w light|strong="H0216"\w* is \w come|strong="H0935"\w*, and the \w glory|strong="H3519"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* is \w risen|strong="H2224"\w* upon thee.\f + \fr 60.1 \ft shine…: or, be enlightened; for thy light cometh\f*

For, behold, the \w darkness|strong="H2822"\w* shall \w cover|strong="H3680"\w* the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, and gross \w darkness|strong="H6205"\w* the \w people|strong="H3816"\w*: but the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* shall \w arise|strong="H2224"\w* upon thee, and his \w glory|strong="H3519"\w* shall be \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* upon thee.

And the \w Gentiles|strong="H1471"\w* shall \w come|strong="H1980"\w* to thy \w light|strong="H0216"\w*, and \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* to the \w brightness|strong="H5051"\w* of thy \w rising|strong="H2225"\w*.

Lift \w up|strong="H5375"\w* thine \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w*, and \w see|strong="H7200"\w*: all they gather themselves \w together|strong="H6908"\w*, they \w come|strong="H0935"\w* to thee: thy \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* shall \w come|strong="H0935"\w* from \w far|strong="H7350"\w*, and thy \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* shall be \w nursed|strong="H0539"\w* at \add thy\add* \w side|strong="H6654"\w*.

Then thou shalt \w see|strong="H7200"\w*, and flow \w together|strong="H5102"\w*, and thine \w heart|strong="H3824"\w* shall \w fear|strong="H6342"\w*, and be \w enlarged|strong="H7337"\w*; because the \w abundance|strong="H1995"\w* of the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w* shall be \w converted|strong="H2015"\w* unto thee, the \w forces|strong="H2428"\w* of the \w Gentiles|strong="H1471"\w* shall \w come|strong="H0935"\w* unto thee.\f + \fr 60.5 \ft abundance…: or, noise of the sea shall be turned toward thee\f*\f + \fr 60.5 \ft forces: or, wealth\f*

The \w multitude|strong="H8229"\w* of \w camels|strong="H1581"\w* shall \w cover|strong="H3680"\w* thee, the \w dromedaries|strong="H1070"\w* of \w Midian|strong="H4080"\w* and \w Ephah|strong="H5891"\w*; all they from \w Sheba|strong="H7614"\w* shall \w come|strong="H0935"\w*: they shall \w bring|strong="H5375"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* and \w incense|strong="H3828"\w*; and they shall shew \w forth|strong="H1319"\w* the \w praises|strong="H8416"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

All the \w flocks|strong="H6629"\w* of \w Kedar|strong="H6938"\w* shall be gathered \w together|strong="H6908"\w* unto thee, the \w rams|strong="H0352"\w* of \w Nebaioth|strong="H5032"\w* shall \w minister|strong="H8334"\w* unto thee: they shall come \w up|strong="H5927"\w* with \w acceptance|strong="H7522"\w* on mine \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*, and I will \w glorify|strong="H6286"\w* the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of my \w glory|strong="H8597"\w*.
Who \add are\add* these \add that\add* \w fly|strong="H5774"\w* as a \w cloud|strong="H5645"\w*, and as the \w doves|strong="H3123"\w* to their \w windows|strong="H0699"\w*?

Surely the \w isles|strong="H0339"\w* shall \w wait|strong="H6960"\w* for me, and the \w ships|strong="H0591"\w* of \w Tarshish|strong="H8659"\w* \w first|strong="H7223"\w*, to \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* thy \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* from \w far|strong="H7350"\w*, their \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* and their \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* with them, unto the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, and to the Holy \w One|strong="H6918"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, because he hath \w glorified|strong="H6286"\w* thee.

And the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w strangers|strong="H5236"\w* shall build \w up|strong="H1129"\w* thy \w walls|strong="H2346"\w*, and their \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* shall \w minister|strong="H8334"\w* unto thee: for in my \w wrath|strong="H7110"\w* I \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* thee, but in my \w favour|strong="H7522"\w* have I had \w mercy|strong="H7355"\w* on thee.

Therefore thy \w gates|strong="H8179"\w* shall be \w open|strong="H6605"\w* \w continually|strong="H8548"\w*; they shall not be \w shut|strong="H5462"\w* \w day|strong="H3119"\w* nor \w night|strong="H3915"\w*; that \add men\add* may \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* unto thee the \w forces|strong="H2428"\w* of the \w Gentiles|strong="H1471"\w*, and \add that\add* their \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* \add may be\add* \w brought|strong="H5090"\w*.\f + \fr 60.11 \ft forces: or, wealth\f*

For the \w nation|strong="H1471"\w* and \w kingdom|strong="H4467"\w* that will not \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* thee shall \w perish|strong="H0006"\w*; yea, \add those\add* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* shall be \w utterly|strong="H2717"\w* \w wasted|strong="H2717"\w*.

The \w glory|strong="H3519"\w* of \w Lebanon|strong="H3844"\w* shall \w come|strong="H0935"\w* unto thee, the fir \w tree|strong="H1265"\w*, the pine \w tree|strong="H8410"\w*, and the \w box|strong="H8391"\w* \w together|strong="H3162"\w*, to \w beautify|strong="H6286"\w* the \w place|strong="H4725"\w* of my \w sanctuary|strong="H4720"\w*; and I will make the \w place|strong="H4725"\w* of my \w feet|strong="H7272"\w* \w glorious|strong="H3513"\w*.

The \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* also of them that \w afflicted|strong="H6031"\w* thee shall \w come|strong="H1980"\w* \w bending|strong="H7817"\w* unto thee; and all they that \w despised|strong="H5006"\w* thee shall bow themselves \w down|strong="H7812"\w* at the \w soles|strong="H3709"\w* of thy \w feet|strong="H7272"\w*; and they shall \w call|strong="H7121"\w* thee, The \w city|strong="H5892"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, The \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w* of the Holy \w One|strong="H6918"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

\w Whereas|strong="H8478"\w* thou hast been \w forsaken|strong="H5800"\w* and \w hated|strong="H8130"\w*, so that no man went \w through|strong="H5674"\w* \add thee\add*, I will \w make|strong="H7760"\w* thee an \w eternal|strong="H5769"\w* \w excellency|strong="H1347"\w*, a \w joy|strong="H4885"\w* of \w many|strong="H1755"\w* \w generations|strong="H1755"\w*.

Thou shalt also \w suck|strong="H3243"\w* the \w milk|strong="H2461"\w* of the \w Gentiles|strong="H1471"\w*, and shalt \w suck|strong="H3243"\w* the \w breast|strong="H7699"\w* of \w kings|strong="H4428"\w*: and thou shalt \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that I the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \add am\add* thy \w Saviour|strong="H3467"\w* and thy \w Redeemer|strong="H1350"\w*, the mighty \w One|strong="H0046"\w* of \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*.

For \w brass|strong="H5178"\w* I will \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, and for \w iron|strong="H1270"\w* I will \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*, and for \w wood|strong="H6086"\w* \w brass|strong="H5178"\w*, and for \w stones|strong="H0068"\w* \w iron|strong="H1270"\w*: I will also \w make|strong="H7760"\w* thy \w officers|strong="H6486"\w* \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*, and thine \w exactors|strong="H5065"\w* \w righteousness|strong="H6666"\w*.

\w Violence|strong="H2555"\w* shall no more be \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* in thy \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, \w wasting|strong="H7701"\w* nor \w destruction|strong="H7667"\w* within thy \w borders|strong="H1366"\w*; but thou shalt \w call|strong="H7121"\w* thy \w walls|strong="H2346"\w* \w Salvation|strong="H3444"\w*, and thy \w gates|strong="H8179"\w* \w Praise|strong="H8416"\w*.

The \w sun|strong="H8121"\w* shall be no more thy \w light|strong="H0216"\w* by \w day|strong="H3119"\w*; neither for \w brightness|strong="H5051"\w* shall the \w moon|strong="H3394"\w* give \w light|strong="H0216"\w* unto thee: but the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* shall be unto thee an \w everlasting|strong="H5769"\w* \w light|strong="H0215"\w*, and thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* thy \w glory|strong="H8597"\w*.

Thy \w sun|strong="H8121"\w* shall no more go \w down|strong="H0935"\w*; neither shall thy \w moon|strong="H3391"\w* \w withdraw|strong="H0622"\w* itself: for the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* shall be thine \w everlasting|strong="H5769"\w* \w light|strong="H0216"\w*, and the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* of thy \w mourning|strong="H0060"\w* shall be \w ended|strong="H7999"\w*.

Thy \w people|strong="H5971"\w* also \add shall be\add* all \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w*: they shall \w inherit|strong="H3423"\w* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*, the \w branch|strong="H5342"\w* of my \w planting|strong="H4302"\w*, the \w work|strong="H4639"\w* of my \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*, that I may be \w glorified|strong="H6286"\w*.

A little \w one|strong="H6996"\w* shall become a \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w*, and a small \w one|strong="H6810"\w* a \w strong|strong="H6099"\w* \w nation|strong="H1471"\w*: I the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* will \w hasten|strong="H2363"\w* it in his \w time|strong="H6256"\w*.
